question_text:

MCQ (1M) 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Question ID : 823251537 
 
Let p and q be two propositions. Consider the following two formulae in propositional logic.

:(

p
p

explanation_text:
Sol.  
1
S
 : (p’(p+q))’ + q = (p’p+p’q)’ + q =  (p’q)’ + q = p + q’ + q = 1 ( Tautology )
2
S
 : q’ + (p’(p+q))  =  q’ + (pp’ + p’q)  = q’ + p’q = (q’ + p’)(q’ + q) = q’+p’
